hero.subtitle: Your career deserves a strategic partner
hero.title: Empowering Your Potential, Connecting You to Opportunity
hero.description: At Reference Agency, we don’t just find you a job — we help you build a career. We match ambitious professionals with forward-thinking companies where they can thrive, grow, and make an impact.

resumeService.title: Submit Your Resume
resumeService.description: Ready for your next career move? Share your resume with us and open the door to new opportunities tailored to your skills, ambitions, and growth potential.

cards.title: Understanding Your Career Goals
cards.description: We start by listening — learning about your ambitions, experiences, and the environments where you can excel.

cards.title: Building Your Professional Profile
cards.description: Together, we craft a strong professional image — from resume optimization to highlighting your unique strengths.

recruitmentProcess.title: Getting to Know You
recruitmentProcess.description: Before we recommend any job, we take time to understand you — your skills, career ambitions, preferred work culture, and what truly motivates you. We believe the right opportunity is about more than a title; it’s about where you can grow and thrive.

cards.title: Smart Matching with Top Employers
cards.description: We align your experience and ambitions with companies that match your potential and growth path.

cards.title: Interview Coaching & Preparation
cards.description: We provide you with detailed preparation, interview tips, and company insights to help you shine.

cards.title: Personalized Career Advice
cards.description: We offer honest, strategic guidance to help you make decisions that serve your long-term success.

recruitmentProcess.title: Connecting You with Opportunities
recruitmentProcess.description: Once we know your story, we connect you with the right opportunities. Not just any open role — but companies and cultures that truly fit your journey. Along the way, we coach you, support you, and open new doors for your career growth.

cards.title: Guiding Your Offers & Decisions
cards.description: We help you review opportunities wisely, negotiate effectively, and secure the best fit for your career goals.

cards.title: Ensuring a Smooth Start
cards.description: We assist with onboarding and transition support, helping you feel prepared and excited for your new role.

recruitmentProcess.title: Supporting Your Next Move
recruitmentProcess.description: When the offers come, we stay by your side. We advise you through evaluations, negotiations, and onboarding — ensuring your next step is a strong, confident leap forward in your career journey.
